channel.title: Shop Making
channel.description:
Yea i recently download the Server Maker.. and i got pretty good at editing the client, and the server. but im having a problem. i used shop maker and i get errors. and i have a question, how can i make a shop that i can put like 25 items into it, and how do i change the price.. i used shop maker, heres the shop i made.. i posted all the codes in the right places but i get errors and when i try to get on the client and log onto my server it doesnt let me log in and i get errors heres my shop code..
[sub][Add under the '}' after 'WanneShop = 2;' in client.java] else if (NPCID == 520) { PutNPCCords = true; WanneShop = 30; }
[Add in shops.cfg] 30 Pker's_Supply_! 1 1 6568 150000 6570 1250000 1725 5000 6585 1000000 5680 65000 4587 100000
[Add in autospawn.cfg] 520 3096 3252 0 0 0 0 0 1 Pking_Items_!
[/sub]

item.title: Shop Making

item.description:
@owner_millon wrote:

ok i want to make a shop…
as in delete myne in edgeville.
make brand new ones,
i got the line i want but i cant get it to work.
i put the shops.cfg line in shops.cfg
and i put the autospawn.cfg line in autospawn.cfg…
i cant get it to work when i try to code it in client.java can someone give me pictures or something on how to do this.

Read full topic

item.title: Shop Making
item.dc:creator: @Dastan1 Dastan_
item.description:
@Dastan1 wrote:

“how can i make a shop that i can put like 25 items into it, and how do i change the price…”

Well , go to items.cfg , search for your item , and the second numbers line is it’s price. Change to whatever you want. And also change its price when the item is noted.

If you want to add more items to specific shop , go to shops.cfg , find your shop , go to the end of its items list , and add your item , Example: 5698 100 , the 5698 is dds’s ID , the 100 is dds’s quantiny. Dont forget to leave “tab” spaces between numbers

Read full topic

item.title: Shop Making
item.dc:creator: @owner_millon owner millon
item.description:
@owner_millon wrote:

Yea i recently download the Server Maker…
and i got pretty good at editing the client, and the server. but im having a problem.
i used shop maker and i get errors. and i have a question,
how can i make a shop that i can put like 25 items into it, and how do i change the price…
i used shop maker, heres the shop i made… i posted all the codes in the right places but i get errors and when i try to get on the client and log onto my server it doesnt let me log in and i get errors heres my shop code…

[sub][Add under the ‘}’ after ‘WanneShop = 2;’ in client.java]
else if (NPCID == 520) {
PutNPCCords = true;
WanneShop = 30;
}

[Add in shops.cfg]
30 Pker’s_Supply_! 1 1 6568 150000 6570 1250000 1725 5000 6585 1000000 5680 65000 4587 100000

[Add in autospawn.cfg]
520 3096 3252 0 0 0 0 0 1 Pking_Items_!

[/sub]

Read full topic
